reviewText: Corny, low budget, not worth a dime. How can we get a refund?!
i stop it after 5 min. of watching it
Wasn't exactly what I expected.  The movie was just okay.  I think acting could have been a little better.  Seemed like a Lifetime movie, not one you would pay for.

If you like stories about very intrepid and resourceful women, then you'll like this.  The main character was almost a superhero which I found very soothing.  She never gave up and saved the day.  I hate the kind of stories where the women scream attractively and fall down because they are wearing high heels.  Or they stand cringing while the male hero is being clobbered and they don't do anything to help him.  This heroine put up a pretty substantial fight mentally and physically to extricate herself and her daughter from a pretty daunting predicament.  Her daughter was no dummy either-- yay for her too.
I promise I have seen better acting at a high school play. Would not recommend it if they paid you 5 bucks to watch it . Low budget down to the igloo cooler! what a waste of time! Oh well!
Beautiful scenery. Very good drama/thriller movie. Reminds me alot of The River Wild. Keeps you on the edge of your seat the whole time.
I just watched this DVD. I enjoyed it, it was very crystal clear with my 4k TV. Thanks.
The dvd work very good and it came right on time like i expected it to be.
It was really difficult to stay tuned to this movie because the acting was pretty bad.  I made myself watch it though to the end. [...]
Very predictable, but a good movie
I really loved this movie! Deffinatly worth seeing and owning my whole family enjoyed it
A remake of, The River Wild, Meryl Streep, Kevin Bacon, David Strathairn, Joseph Mazzello.
